text: "Show Don't Tell" is a 1989 song by Canadian progressive rock band Rush and is the leading single from their 13th studio album Presto. It went to number 1 on the Billboard Hot Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. ==Track listing== Music by Lifeson, Peart, and Lee. Lyrics by Peart. US release: #Show Don't Tell - 5:01 Canadian release: #Show Don't Tell (Edit) - 4:17 #Red Tide - 4:29 #Force Ten (live) - 4:50 == References == Category:1989 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Rush (band) songs Category:Progressive rock songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Funk rock songs
title: Show Don't Tell
